You forgot to mention:  THIS IS A STANDALONE GAME.   Sniper Elite V2 is NOT required!  So for everyone out there like me, who uninstalled V2 and deleted the ISO a long time ago, never fear!  Nazi zombies are here!

Game was crashing for me after it got to Nazi Zombie Army page, so I disconnected from the the internet and it works fine :)

no you cannot play multiplayer ever on any crack.

AFTER OPENING LOGO BLACK SCREEN / CRASH FIX:
I had the same problem, here is how to fix it...
Start the game, and right when the Rebellion logo comes up, 
hit ALT-ENTER, to make a window, the game will continue to load, 
then once u get to the main menu, u can hit alt-enter again to go back to full screen.
I have to do this just about every time I want to play..... 
(but not always.... its quite odd that way...)

Good Luck!
